DOC.brief_summary: In study food supplement OPC Factor test determine effectiveness increase energy level healthy people age 45-65 compare placebo . All subject receive active product placebo time study . The study nine week duration . It involve three visit , take effervescent powder water twice day , answer 24 multiple choice question week . Subjects complete study elect receive two month supply study product free charge .
DOC.detailed_description: OPC Factor , food supplement contain grape seed extract , pine bark extract , vitamins mineral , show clinical observation effect raise energy level people age 45-65 . It believe mechanism action base enhanced production ATP mitochondrion . In study subject assign chance either active product group placebo group . Subjects take product three week . Then two week wash period follow subject cross group three week period . Subjects , assessor , health provider mask active product group placebo group . Subjects meet primary investigator three time study , fill short question week , receive phone call week study personnel . This study randomize , placebo control , triple-blinded , cross-over study test hypothesis OPC Factor produce response rate 70 % active product phase versus 30 % response rate placebo phase . A response define least 20 % absolute increase Energy subscale Activation-Deactivation Adjective Check List .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 45 65 year age time recruitment 2 . Healthy see exclusion criterion 3 . There possibility least 20 % absolute increase subject 's energy subscale score ActivationDeactivation Adjective Checklist ( AD ACL ) . For purpose meeting inclusion criterion , subject fill AD ACL follow instruction : `` Each word describe feeling mood . Please circle rating next word best describes feeling past month . These instruction different instruction use study endpoint measure consistent way questionnaire validate . '' 1 . Any major medical mental illness ( include history bipolar disorder , borderline personality disorder , schizophrenia ) 2 . Medical disease know associate fatigue limit : AIDS Anemia Cancer history cancer ( exclude basal cell carcinoma skin ) Chronic fatigue syndrome Congestive heart failure Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) Depression Diabetes Drug/alcohol dependence Fibromyalgia Hypertension uncontrolled difficult control Hypothyroidism 3 . Subjects take follow medical therapy : Betablocking medication Human growth hormone Testosterone Warfarin 4 . Subjects take follow complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) product : Feverfew Garlic supplement Ginseng Red clover 5 . Women go menopause woman one menstrual period 12 month prior enrollment study 6 . The subject 's score energy subscale AD ACL level precludes least 20 % absolute increase score . 7 . Subjects unable make decision regard informed consent 8 . Those subject take medical therapy CAM product list longer take eligible participate provide exclusion criterion present subject take therapy product six month prior enrollment .
